sections.heading: An action for replevin must be brought in a court of competent jurisdiction based on the value of the property sought to be replevied
sections.text: When property consists of separate articles, the value of any one of which is within the jurisdiction of a lower court but taken together will exceed that jurisdicti

sections.heading: An action for replevin may be brought in any county where the property sought to be replevied is located, where the contract was signed, where the defendant resides, or where the cause of action accrued
sections.text: An action that includes a cause of action for replevin and other causes of action may be brought
